home.title: Hi, I'm Carlos Roa!
home.description: Frontend developer specialized in React, JavaScript, and modern web technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm a frontend developer with over 3 years of experience building dynamic and accessible user interfaces. I specialize in React and modern technologies, always aiming to deliver high-performance, intuitive experiences.
about.description: I enjoy working in teams, collaborating with designers, and keeping my code clean and scalable. I love solving real-world problems and building impactful products.
about.quote: Building functional interfaces is only part of development — what drives me is the impact they have on people’s experiences.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Do you have any questions or proposals? Send me a message!
contact.name: Name *
